text: Kim Jong-pil (, January 7, 1926 - June 23, 2018) was a former South Korean politician and general. He fought in the Korean War. He was the 11th Prime minister of South Korea (1971 to 1975), 31th Prime minister of South Korea (1998 to 2000). first Central Intelligence Agency of South Korea 1961 to 1963. His nickname was 'Unjeong'(Korea:운정, hanja:雲庭) or 'JP'. Kim died on June 23, 2018 in Seoul from respiratory failure at the age of 92. ==References== == Other websites == * Kim Jong-pil * Kim Jong-pil:National Assembly of the Republic of Korea Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Anti-communists Category:South Korean generals Category:Military personnel of the Korean War Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea
title: Kim Jong-pil
